content: for our email newsletter so you don t miss the next one also i d love to see your work tag me in your photos on instagram using @thechesapeakeneedle #thechesapeakeneedle and #favoritecablebeanie so that i can find you easily i just might share your photos on my page if you had fun using this pattern please consider pinning this link on pinterest and passing it along to a friend who might like to make it too you also can find me on pinterest ravelry instagram and facebook see you there
